vlive.korean: 여러분은 좋은 밤을 보내고 계십니다! And you are having a great time today! 듣기 View video AB6IX : 고마워요❤
vlive.english: And you are having a great time today!

vlive.korean: [보고 계십니다] 쫙 펼쳐져 있다고? 동그란 거 주위로? [Hope you enjoy it] Stretched to the side? Around the round one? 듣기 View video OSEN : "엑소・위너→트와이스・있지" 베스트 토크・안무는? #스타로드 결산②
vlive.english: [Hope you enjoy it] Stretched to the side? Around the round one?

vlive.korean: [스키즈의 아침식사 현장을 보고 계십니다] - 시리얼만 먹어야 돼 - 시리얼만 먹어야 돼? [without any other option but cereal] - You have to eat cereal only. - Do I have to? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Stray Kids] 시리얼파🥣vs밥파🍚 나는 스키즈 좋아서 지구 완전 격파💥 (Stray Kids eating cereal)
vlive.english: [without any other option but cereal] - You have to eat cereal only. - Do I have to?

vlive.korean: [본인들 굿즈가 세상 신기한 아이돌을 보고 계십니다] - 진짜요? - 생각보다... - 이거 카드였어! [You are watching an idol amazed by their own goods] - Really? - More than I expected... - It was a card! 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “슈퍼엠도 해봤다! 굿즈 언박싱” (Super M)
vlive.english: [You are watching an idol amazed by their own goods] - Really? - More than I expected... - It was a card!

vlive.korean: 구름 위를 걷고계십니다. He's walking on clouds. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#149. 오. 꼭. 말. (오졌다고 꼭 말해줘야지) (w. 하성운)

examples.korean: Mr Green is out of town this week. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그린 씨가 이번 주에는 시내에 안 계십니다[출장 중이십니다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Mr Green is out of town this week. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I'm sorry, but you're overreacting to what was said. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 죄송합니다만, 들으신 내용에 대해 과민반응을 하고 계십니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I'm sorry, but you're overreacting to what was said. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My father has tried to settle his difficulties for a long time. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아버지는 오랫동안 문제점들을 해결하고자 노력하고 계십니다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: My father has tried to settle his difficulties for a long time. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our managing director is asking everyone in the overseas offices to refrain from discussing the merger with anyone outside the company. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당사 전무이사께서 어떤 외부인과도 이번 합병을 논의하지 말라고 해외지사의 모든 직원에게 당부하고 계십니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: Our managing director is asking everyone in the overseas offices to refrain from discussing the merger with anyone outside the company. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My former employers all appreciated my work and they all understand my desire to change jobs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 예전 고용주들은 제 일을 높이 평가하셨고 제가 직장 옮기는 것을 다들 이해하고 계십니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: My former employers all appreciated my work and they all understand my desire to change jobs. Add to Wordbook
